sourcesContent:
import Axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" let Signup=()=>{ let[data,updatedata]=useState({ name:"", email:"", password:"" }) let updatehandler=(event)=>{ updatedata({...data,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } let signinhandler=()=>{ Axios.post('http://localhost:8080/user/login',data).then().catch() } let signuphandler=()=>{ Axios.post('http://localhost:8080/user/register',data).then().catch() } return
Name
Email
Password
} export default Signup
